_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_GROUPPATH_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# (CATGROUP_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, CATALOG_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, CATGROUPPATH VARCHAR(4000))
_config:table.name: TI_GROUPPATH_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:query.sql: (SELECT CATGRPREL.CATGROUP_ID_CHILD, CATGRPREL.CATGROUP_ID_PARENT, CATGRPREL.CATALOG_ID, CATGRPREL.SEQUENCE FROM CATGRPREL, TI_CGPUB_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CD WHERE CATGRPREL.CATGROUP_ID_CHILD = CD.CATGROUP_ID AND CD.PUBLISHED IN (?unpublished?, ?published?) AND CATGRPREL.CATALOG_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT CATGPENREL.CATALOG_ID FROM CATGPENREL, TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CE WHERE CATGPENREL.CATENTRY_ID=CE.CATENTRY_ID)) UNION (SELECT CATTOGRP.CATGROUP_ID AS CATGROUP_ID_CHILD, 0 AS CATGROUP_ID_PARENT, CATTOGRP.CATALOG_ID, CATTOGRP.SEQUENCE FROM CATTOGRP, TI_CGPUB_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CD WHERE CATTOGRP.CATGROUP_ID = CD.CATGROUP_ID AND CD.PUBLISHED IN (?unpublished?, ?published?) AND CATTOGRP.CATALOG_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT CATGPENREL.CATALOG_ID FROM CATGPENREL, TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CE WHERE CATGPENREL.CATENTRY_ID=CE.CATENTRY_ID) ) ORDER BY CATGROUP_ID_CHILD, CATALOG_ID

_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_ENTGRPPATH_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# (CATENTRY_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, ENTGRPPATH CLOB, PRIMARY KEY (CATENTRY_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_ENTGRPPATH_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:query.sql: (SELECT CATGPENREL.CATENTRY_ID CATENTRY_ID, CP.CATGROUPPATH, CATGPENREL.SEQUENCE FROM CATGPENREL, TI_GROUPPATH_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CP, TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CE WHERE CATGPENREL.CATENTRY_ID=CE.CATENTRY_ID AND CATGPENREL.CATALOG_ID = CP.CATALOG_ID AND CATGPENREL.CATGROUP_ID = CP.CATGROUP_ID AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CATENTREL WHERE CATENTRY_ID_CHILD=CE.CATENTRY_ID AND CATRELTYPE_ID ='PRODUCT_ITEM')) UNION (SELECT X.CATENTRY_ID_CHILD CATENTRY_ID, CP.CATGROUPPATH, CATGPENREL.SEQUENCE FROM CATGPENREL, TI_GROUPPATH_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CP, (SELECT CATENTRY_ID_PARENT,CATENTRY_ID_CHILD FROM TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#,CATENTREL WHERE CATENTRY_ID_CHILD=CATENTRY_ID AND CATENTTYPE_ID='ItemBean' AND CATRELTYPE_ID='PRODUCT_ITEM') X WHERE CATGPENREL.CATALOG_ID = CP.CATALOG_ID AND CATGPENREL.CATGROUP_ID = CP.CATGROUP_ID AND CATGPENREL.CATENTRY_ID=X.CATENTRY_ID_PARENT) ORDER BY CATENTRY_ID
